[LINKEDIN] Hiring Video Editors 🚨 Wait…! To every video editor out there—read this. You pour your time, energy, creativity, and skill into a trial edit. You think: “This could turn into a client…” But after you deliver it—crickets. No feedback. No response. No respect. Let’s be real: A trial edit isn’t “free content.” It’s your time. Your craft. Your value. Too many clients treat trial edits like free samples—testing dozens of editors with zero intention to hire. Some even use those edits without paying. Others vanish without a word. And worst of all, some are outright scams. Clients—this is on you: ✅ Provide feedback. A simple “no thanks” shows respect. ✅ Don’t ghost. Silence kills trust and reputation. ✅ Hire one. If you’re serious, one great editor is all you need. Editors—protect your energy: ❌ Don’t accept every trial request. ✅ Qualify first. Ask for briefs, budgets, and timelines. ✅ Trust your instincts. If it feels shady, walk away. ✅ Say no. Your time is as valuable as your talent. ✅ Charge a deposit or paid trial when needed. This industry thrives on trust and professionalism. You’re not a vending machine of free samples—you’re a creative partner. Clients: Treat trial edits like the paid work they are. Editors: Guard your time and talent fiercely. 🔄 Repost if you agree. 💬 Comment “RESPECT” if you’re done with unpaid trials. #Editors #VideoEditors #VideoEditing #CreativeRespect #FreelanceLife #ClientEtiquette #hiringvideoeditor

[LINKEDIN] I'm sorry to say - 90% of video editors are frauds. Their portfolios look amazing: → Flashy reels → Trendy effects → Professional showreels They claim to be the best... But their content gets 200 views. Here's what they're missing: They edit videos. We need people who edit attention. The difference? They focus on making it look good, We focus on making it perform. They follow templates, We break patterns to stop the scroll. I've seen editors spend 6 hours perfecting a transition nobody will notice. Meanwhile, our editors know exactly when to jump-cut mid-sentence to create urgency. That's why most "professional" editors fail at content creation. They learned filmmaking, not platform psychology. So if you understand that good editing is invisible but great editing is addictive... We're hiring video editors. Not 1, not 2... But 7. At Praper, you'll edit for top creators and learn what actually makes content work. To get the application link: - Comment "REAL" - Send a connection request too. LinkedIn won't let me DM otherwise. #hiring #videoediting #skills #growthmindset

[LINKEDIN] Position: Brand Manager & Social Media Content Creator Location: Karachi, Pakistan Company: Lakhani Builders About Us: Lakhani Builders is a leading name in the real estate development sector, known for delivering high-quality projects in Karachi. We believe in creating lasting value — not just in the homes we build, but in the relationships we nurture with our clients and the communities we serve. Job Overview: We are looking for a dynamic and creative Brand Manager who will also take the lead in producing compelling social media content. This hybrid role requires someone who can think strategically about brand growth and positioning while being hands-on with digital content creation, campaign management, and platform engagement. Key Responsibilities: Brand Strategy & Management: - Develop and implement a cohesive brand strategy aligned with company goals. - Position Lakhani Builders as a trusted, premium brand in the real estate market. - Collaborate with leadership on messaging, visuals, and brand partnerships. - Monitor and analyze brand performance metrics to guide future initiatives. Social Media & Content Creation: - Create, curate, and manage content across Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and YouTube. - Plan and execute monthly content calendars, including visuals, copy, and hashtags. - Produce reels, short videos, and on-site content from construction sites, events. - Increase follower engagement through storytelling, trend-based content, and community interaction. Campaigns & Advertising: - Plan and manage paid ad campaigns across Meta and Google platforms. - Work with designers and video editors when needed to ensure high-quality outputs. - Track campaign performance and optimize for better reach and ROI. - Collaboration & Reporting - Coordinate with the sales team to align marketing efforts with lead generation goals. - Provide monthly brand and digital performance reports with actionable insights. Qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Media Studies, Communications, or a related field. - 2–4 years of experience in brand management and social media. - Strong content creation skills (Reels, Stories, Photography, and Captions). - Proficiency in tools like Adobe Photoshop, Canva, and basic video editing apps. - Excellent communication skills in English and Urdu. - Familiarity with the real estate market is a plus. What We Offer: - A dynamic and collaborative work environment. - Competitive salary package. - Opportunity to shape the digital face of one of Karachi’s most respected real estate brands. - Exposure to real estate marketing and customer engagement strategies. How to Apply: Send your resume and portfolio to builders.hrd@gmail.com OR 03245254264 with the subject line: Application – Brand Manager & Social Media Creator.
